channel.title: [637] Dementhium -- Compiling & Teleports
channel.description:
Whenever I compile, on all other servers I've been on (562 and under) you compile, log out, and it's there.
For the 639, you have to compile, RESTART EVERYTHING, and then it'll be there.. Is there a way to make it so I can compile, log out, and it'll be there without having to restart the server and client?
[hr]
My other question is, people add teleports to the quest tab/task tab.. I want to add MORE teleports to my task tab. All I know is it's in the InterfaceSettings.java place.. but how do I add more teleports to select from? http://gyazo.com/be73e844e6611531dd6f004c9c5bdf76.png
Or if you don't know how to do that, how do I make it so I can talk to an NPC and have them teleport me to places?

item.title: [637] Dementhium -- Compiling & Teleports
item.dc:creator: @EatMyWhiteStuff EatMyWhiteStuff
item.description:
@EatMyWhiteStuff wrote:

Whenever I compile, on all other servers I’ve been on (562 and under) you compile, log out, and it’s there.

For the 639, you have to compile, RESTART EVERYTHING, and then it’ll be there…
Is there a way to make it so I can compile, log out, and it’ll be there without having to restart the server and client?

[hr]

My other question is, people add teleports to the quest tab/task tab…
I want to add MORE teleports to my task tab.
All I know is it’s in the InterfaceSettings.java place… but how do I add more teleports to select from?

Or if you don’t know how to do that, how do I make it so I can talk to an NPC and have them teleport me to places?

Read full topic
